ResourceHeader.Description: Gakona (GAKO) Station is located at Gakona, Alaska. Magnetic Latitude: 63.05 Magnetic Longitude: 269.51 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: ASI/GBO: S. Mende and E. Donovan for use of the ASI data.
